Find a keyword

Source: R/helpers.R
find_keyword.Rd

Find a keyword in all names and labels of a list of datasets.

Usage

find_keyword(keyword, data = getOption("edc_lookup"), ignore_case = TRUE)

Arguments

keyword

the keyword to search for

data

the dataframe where to search the keyword. Can be set using options(edc_lookup=my_data), which is done automatically when calling read_trialmaster().

ignore_case

should case differences be ignored in the match?

Value

a filtered tibble

EDCimport

Usually,

Examples

library(crosstable)
library(dplyr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: ‘dplyr’
#> The following objects are masked from ‘package:stats’:
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from ‘package:base’:
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
library(purrr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: ‘purrr’
#> The following object is masked from ‘package:crosstable’:
#> 
#>     compact

#Using a custom table list
lookup = list(i=crosstable::iris2, m=crosstable::mtcars2) %>% get_lookup()
find_keyword("hp", data=lookup)
#> # A tibble: 2 × 5
#>   dataset  nrow  ncol names   labels            
#>   <chr>   <dbl> <dbl> <chr>   <chr>             
#> 1 m          32    14 hp      Gross horsepower  
#> 2 m          32    14 hp_date Some nonsense date
find_keyword("number|date", data=lookup)
#> # A tibble: 5 × 5
#>   dataset  nrow  ncol names      labels                 
#>   <chr>   <dbl> <dbl> <chr>      <chr>                  
#> 1 m          32    14 cyl        Number of cylinders    
#> 2 m          32    14 gear       Number of forward gears
#> 3 m          32    14 carb       Number of carburetors  
#> 4 m          32    14 hp_date    Some nonsense date     
#> 5 m          32    14 qsec_posix Date+time              
find_keyword("number|date", data=lookup, ignore_case=FALSE)
#> # A tibble: 1 × 5
#>   dataset  nrow  ncol names   labels            
#>   <chr>   <dbl> <dbl> <chr>   <chr>             
#> 1 m          32    14 hp_date Some nonsense date

#Using lookup from [read_trialmaster()]
if (FALSE) {
path = system.file("extdata/Example_Export_SAS_XPORT_2022_08_25_15_16.zip", 
                   package = "EDCimport", mustWork=TRUE)
w = read_trialmaster(path, verbose=FALSE)
options(edc_lookup=w$.lookup) #optional
find_keyword("patient")
}
